imagePullSecrets.description: Global Docker registry secret names as an array

defaultStorageClass.description: Global default StorageClass for Persistent Volume(s)

adaptSecurityContext.description: Adapt the securityContext sections of the deployment to make them compatible with Openshift restricted-v2 SCC: remove runAsUser, runAsGroup and fsGroup and let the platform use their allowed default IDs. Possible values: auto (apply if the detected running cluster is Openshift), force (perform the adaptation always), disabled (do not perform adaptation)

omitEmptySeLinuxOptions.description: If set to true, removes the seLinuxOptions from the securityContexts when it is set to an empty object

commonLabels.description: Labels to add to all deployed objects

commonAnnotations.description: Annotations to add to all deployed objects

extraDeploy.description: Array of extra objects to deploy with the release

enabled.description: Enable diagnostic mode (all probes will be disabled and the command will be overridden)

command.description: Command to override all containers in the chart release

args.description: Args to override all containers in the chart release

digest.description: VyHub app image digest in the way sha256:aa.... Please note this parameter, if set, will override the tag image tag (immutable tags are recommended)

debug.description: Enable VyHub app image debug mode

replicaCount.description: Number of VyHub app replicas to deploy

extraContainerPorts.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional ports for VyHub app containers

enabled.description: Enable livenessProbe on VyHub app containers
Enable readinessProbe on VyHub app containers
Enable startupProbe on VyHub app containers

customLivenessProbe.description: Custom livenessProbe that overrides the default one

customReadinessProbe.description: Custom readinessProbe that overrides the default one

customStartupProbe.description: Custom startupProbe that overrides the default one

resourcesPreset.description: Set VyHub app container resources according to one common preset (allowed values: none, nano, small, medium, large, xlarge, 2xlarge). This is ignored if app.resources is set (app.resources is recommended for production).

resources.description: Set VyHub app container requests and limits for different resources like CPU or memory (essential for production workloads)

enabled.description: Enable VyHub app pods' Security Context

fsGroupChangePolicy.description: Set filesystem group change policy for VyHub app pods

sysctls.description: Set kernel settings using the sysctl interface for VyHub app pods

supplementalGroups.description: Set filesystem extra groups for VyHub app pods

fsGroup.description: Set fsGroup in VyHub app pods' Security Context

enabled.description: Enabled VyHub app container' Security Context

runAsUser.description: Set runAsUser in VyHub app container' Security Context

runAsGroup.description: Set runAsGroup in VyHub app container' Security Context

runAsNonRoot.description: Set runAsNonRoot in VyHub app container' Security Context

readOnlyRootFilesystem.description: Set readOnlyRootFilesystem in VyHub app container' Security Context

privileged.description: Set privileged in VyHub app container' Security Context

allowPrivilegeEscalation.description: Set allowPrivilegeEscalation in VyHub app container' Security Context

drop.description: List of capabilities to be dropped in VyHub app container

type.description: Set seccomp profile in VyHub app container

command.description: Override default VyHub app container command (useful when using custom images)

args.description: Override default VyHub app container args (useful when using custom images)

automountServiceAccountToken.description: Mount Service Account token in VyHub app pods

podLabels.description: Extra labels for VyHub app pods

podAffinityPreset.description: Pod affinity preset. Ignored if `app.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

podAntiAffinityPreset.description: Pod anti-affinity preset. Ignored if `app.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

type.description: Node affinity preset type. Ignored if `app.affinity` is set. Allowed values: `soft` or `hard`

key.description: Node label key to match. Ignored if `app.affinity` is set

values.description: Node label values to match. Ignored if `app.affinity` is set

affinity.description: Affinity for VyHub app pods assignment

nodeSelector.description: Node labels for VyHub app pods assignment

tolerations.description: Tolerations for VyHub app pods assignment

topologySpreadConstraints.description: Topology Spread Constraints for VyHub app pod assignment spread across your cluster among failure-domains

schedulerName.description: Name of the k8s scheduler (other than default) for VyHub app pods

terminationGracePeriodSeconds.description: Seconds VyHub app pods need to terminate gracefully

lifecycleHooks.description: for VyHub app containers to automate configuration before or after startup

extraEnvVars.description: Array with extra environment variables to add to VyHub app containers

extraEnvVarsCM.description: Name of existing ConfigMap containing extra env vars for VyHub app containers

extraEnvVarsSecret.description: Name of existing Secret containing extra env vars for VyHub app containers

extraVolumes.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumes for the VyHub app pods

extraVolumeMounts.description: Optionally specify extra list of additional volumeMounts for the VyHub app containers

sidecars.description: Add additional sidecar containers to the VyHub app pods

initContainers.description: Add additional init containers to the VyHub app pods

create.description: Enable/disable a Pod Disruption Budget creation

minAvailable.description: Minimum number/percentage of pods that should remain scheduled

maxUnavailable.description: Maximum number/percentage of pods that may be made unavailable. Defaults to `1` if both `app.pdb.minAvailable` and `app.pdb.maxUnavailable` are empty.

enabled.description: Enable VPA for VyHub app pods

controlledResources.description: VPA List of resources that the vertical pod autoscaler can control. Defaults to cpu and memory

maxAllowed.description: VPA Max allowed resources for the pod

minAllowed.description: VPA Min allowed resources for the pod

enabled.description: Enable HPA for VyHub app pods

create.description: Specifies whether a ServiceAccount should be created

name.description: The name of the ServiceAccount to use.

annotations.description: Additional Service Account annotations (evaluated as a template)

automountServiceAccountToken.description: Automount service account token for the server service account

create.description: Specifies whether RBAC resources should be created

loadBalancerIP.description: VyHub app service Load Balancer IP

loadBalancerSourceRanges.description: VyHub app service Load Balancer sources

externalTrafficPolicy.description: VyHub app service external traffic policy

annotations.description: Additional custom annotations for VyHub app service

extraPorts.description: Extra ports to expose in VyHub app service (normally used with the `sidecars` value)

sessionAffinity.description: Control where client requests go, to the same pod or round-robin

rootPath.description: When a reverse proxy with path stripping is used, set this to the stripped path. For example /api.

pathPrefix.description: When a reverse proxy without path stripping is used, set this to path of the application. For example /api.

frontendUrl.description: The URL where the Frontend is located

addons.description: A list of enabled addons. Example: [forum, addon2, addon3]

customFrontend.description: If enabled, the web folder stays untouched and frontend files must be supplied manually

cryptSecret.description: A random string with at least 32 chars

sessionSecret.description: A random string with at least 32 chars

debug.description: Enables debug mode which causes stack traces to be printed. Should be false in production.

echo.description: Enables output of all SQL queries (to stdout)

secure.description: Enables HTTPS for the application. Not required with a reverse proxy (nginx).

genCert.description: Generates self-signed TLS certificates on startup for HTTPS

port.description: Specifies on which port the application listens

workers.description: Specifies how many processes of the application are running.

maxWait.description: The maximum amount of seconds the application wait for the database to become available

poolSize.description: The amount of connections that application always maintains to the database

poolOverflow.description: The maximum amount of connections that the application can establish additionally to the pool size. These connections will be closed if not needed anymore.

lokiUrl.description: The URL to the Loki logging server

enabled.description: Enable ingress record generation for VyHub

apiVersion.description: Force Ingress API version (automatically detected if not set)

hostname.description: Default host for the ingress record

ingressClassName.description: IngressClass that will be be used to implement the Ingress (Kubernetes 1.18+)

annotations.description: Additional annotations for the Ingress resource. To enable certificate autogeneration, place here your cert-manager annotations.

tls.description: Enable TLS configuration for the host defined at `ingress.hostname` parameter

selfSigned.description: Create a TLS secret for this ingress record using self-signed certificates generated by Helm

extraHosts.description: An array with additional hostname(s) to be covered with the ingress record

extraPaths.description: An array with additional arbitrary paths that may need to be added to the ingress under the main host

extraTls.description: TLS configuration for additional hostname(s) to be covered with this ingress record

extraRules.description: Additional rules to be covered with this ingress record

enabled.description: Enable persistence using Persistent Volume Claims

existingClaim.description: Name of an existing PVC to use

storageClass.description: PVC Storage Class for vyhub-web volume

subPath.description: The sub path used in the volume

accessModes.description: The access mode of the volume

selector.description: Selector to match an existing Persistent Volume

enabled.description: Enable init container that changes the owner/group of the PV mount point to `runAsUser:fsGroup`

pullPolicy.description: OS Shell + Utility image pull policy

pullSecrets.description: OS Shell + Utility image pull secrets

runAsUser.description: Set init container's Security Context runAsUser
